content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on the 15 freeway when i saw the large glowing ball rise up(to the east across the highway) then move rapidly across the sky, then a drone-like helicopter with lights and small wings appeared and they both were moving fast across the sky with the drone type thing doing circle 8s and fancy flying.
i got out of my car to watch the show for about 15 minutes,was mesmorized by what i was watching, did not even think to get a picture!!!
content.summary: Two objects one a glowing white ball, the other appeared like like helicoper or drone

content.detailedDescription: My mum and i were driving north on the new jersey turnpike at 9:30 at night. we were approaching exit 8 near rossmoor and monroe township when i, sitting in the passenger seat, noticed what appeared to be a bright blue-white star rapidly descend from the sky and disappear a moment later. immediately i asked her if she saw that to which she replied "yes. i did't want to say anything because i thought it may have been a streetlight or something." it clearly was not a streetlight as it was well above the earth. the star-like shape was about 50-60 degrees above the horizon facing north. when it disappeared, it did not dip down to the horizon it simply disappeared at about 30-45 degrees. there were no clouds in the area. all this happened within a second or so. we both ruled out a shooting star since it did not leave a tail of any sorts and it was too bright and too fast to be any kind of airplane, commercial or military. also, if it was an airplane it would have continued to descend until it flew over the horizon. the only conclusion i can make is that it is indeed a ufo. it is unidentified. it is flying. and it is an object. alien or not who knows. i just hope other motorists may have witnessed the same thing.
content.summary: Starlike shape descended at a rapid speed and promptly disappeared. no cloudcover. did not leave tail.

content.detailedDescription: While floating in our pool with my son my son and i were simply gazing up at the stars enjoying the evening sky. we both noticed a strangely lit object traveling south in a straight line yet the position of the object was on an angle which made no sense.  it was headed south yet the object was pointed  south west.  there were three distinct lights which held a consistent brightness level. it never  changed direction.  the center light was more oblong then the outside lights. i told my son "that ain't no airplane no blinking lights" he was amazed. i was curious and enjoyed this experience. the craft, while never changing direction suddenly increased the intensity of the three light sources by several times held it for a few moments while the craft seemed to slow slightly. the three lights went back to the original level of brightness then the position of the craft turned heading south from front to back where it was originally facing further west. my son became uneasy seeing this event while i felt fulfilled seeing what i believe to be a ufo. the craft continued heading south and we lost sight of it as it traveled beyond the tree line.  an interesting way to end the labor day weekend. the time was between 8:30 and 8:45.
content.summary: Witnessed 3 separate lights in line center one more oblong. solid object traveling in southerly direction.

content.detailedDescription: I just saw a ufo.... i'm not kidding this is not a joke... i was talking on the phone, looking out my window.I saw two red lights in the sky a little ways off, i thought it was planes or helicopters... as they got closer i watched them stop completely and change direction... they were headed north/south....Suddenly they went east... then after about ten seconds.. they stopped dead... sat motionless and then went n/s again.. finally as they got to about my house (generally speaking) they changed direction one last time.... back to an e/w heading...I ten or my front door and watched them suddenly accelerate much faster than anything i've ever seen and were gone, no noise, no lights other than each having one red light....Poof, gone
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Moving red light, no noise, rapid direction change

content.detailedDescription:
When i was monitoring my home security camera's,i observed a white circular light shining on the grass in my backyard at 11pm on august 17. the light appeared to be a focused beam coming from almost directly overhead. it could only be seen with the infrared night vision of the camera,because when i went outside to see the light i couldn't see it. this light beam remained in this spot overnight until daylight and was still there the next night until about 11:15pm, when it moved off to the east out of camera view. at times it seemed to waver slightly and go in and out of focus. i have the video from the camera saved on a flash drive in avi format if you like to view it.

thank you, [name removed/cms/dr]
content.summary: A beam of light was picked up by my infrared night surveillance camera at night.

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside looking for meteor shower. noticed object, looked like satellite in orbit. passing through handle of big dipper. as i was watching, it was almost like it knew i was. it stopped. stood still for awhile then darted in reverse. stood still again then darted in original direction. continued this zig zag darting action and stopping. seemed to be heading away from earth. kept going in this zig zag flight pattern until it was too faint to observe. was heading towards the planet mars.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like a satlelite. stopped. reversed. forward. zig zag flight.

content.detailedDescription: Enjoying my day on the lake and decided to take a selfie...I never do this...But the image has some sort of glow behind me that looks interesting at least. thought i would share it and maybe get some input fro the masses...
content.summary: Large glowing cloud like object near bridge over lake wylie between nc and sc state line

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in the morning to kaufman texas heading to work with a couple coworkers when i look to the sky and seeing something coming down through the clouds that suddenly stopped and glowing.  it wa. i have no idea what it is and wondered if anyone else does someone said it may be in armana pretty bright we took pictures with our cell phones
content.summary: It was falling from the sky and then it just stopped the picture was taken with a phone you can see the streets to the cloud where it came down

content.detailedDescription: This happend a few years ago so i can't really describe to you in full detail about what happend. it was around six in the afternoon i was outside of my house for my friend to show up so we could play. i remember i was staring at the sunset when a yellow light cought the corner of my eye, it was getting more into my line of sight so i quickly glaced at it thinking it was the sun. i turned my head back around when i thought i saw the outline of triangles! so i turned my head back around and that's when i saw four massive triangles moving slowly from the top of the mountains! these triangles were huge they had to to be at least a half a mile in diameter. besides my i neck i was complety pearlized looking thing or things. i say things because i couldn't if it was just on object four flying on some type of formation. it moved slowly to the north east when i heard voices coming from the street. there was a old couple walking there dog from the other side of the street both of them were looking in the same direction i was looking. i told if "they were seeing this to" and said "yeah". what's weirder still is that the dog was moving looking at the sky an moving its head to the left almost as if it see's it. we saw for a few more minutes before it disaperd in the sunset. i'm not much of an artist bit here's a sketch of what i saw.
content.summary: Seen what look like four huge triangles head towards the north east then disaperd

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was watching the weather and a unusual cloud that was above downtown mpls area and planned on taking a few pictures of cloud.I had not retrieve d my android phone yet when a oval black/blue object from the north(north mpls)appeared and was traveling south.It was moving oddly,swaying,wableing,tilting,at times and moving fast and slow.The object i thought was a helicopter became clear it was not.It moved to fast and oddly to be a plane or helicopter.When it got closer i could tell it was oval shaped jet black/with blue outer ring.Though the blue ring was not always visible.It was about 2 miles at closes point to me.I ran quickly,excitedly to get my phone/camera.This took about 30 seconds.When i returned it was hovering at about 2-3 thousand ft.I took a picture from my apt window(3rd floor)while it was relatively still.I should have taken a bunch of pics at once but i didnt think it would take off so quickly.After taking pic as though it knew i took its picture,it changed direction and headed east directly into unusual cloud,gaining altitude,tilting at incredible speed.Covering 4 miles to cloud to the east in approximately 5 seconds.The craft itself seemed alive/intelligent but it could be my imagination.The object was larger or as large as commercial airliner 747 and made no noise.After blowing up my picture later i could see vaguely that it had what appeared like a antenna or 2 rods on top.It had a definite aura or lightness/darkness around the object.I am x-military and no that this was no plane,helicopter,drone or like.It was also not traveling in a plane route,and moved very strangely.I would guess its size of 400 ft round,but not perfectly round.It also reminded me of a moving hole in the atmosphere being jet black/dark blue against the light blue/white clouds.When it hovered i approximate it was near,above lake harriet.Before it flew into large unusual cloud over downtown mpls.It never reappeared.There here.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Dark black/blue oval like entity flew at 2-3 thousand ft,tilting,wableing,fuzzy,hovered,disappeared into strange cloud

content.detailedDescription: My son's best friend and three of his college friends went hiking mt. kahtadin in baxter state park on august 10, 2014. at approximately 3/4 of the way to the peak(10 am) they were resting and they all saw a vapor trail. all four boys caught the image on their phones. i don't think it was an astroid because as far as i know asteroids don't loop and gun themselves straight into the water. could you tell me what you think it is?
content.summary: Sighting of vapor trails

content.detailedDescription:
9/7/11 approx. 22:30 hrs

subject was standing by woodbroiler facing east at 20890 friesland rd. 

subject claims objects "tugged" him into position, at which point two orbs of white light, beachball in size, passed overhead from the west at a height of apporx. 50 feet.

as orbs passed over, subject claims that they transmitted blueprints for engine-like device. he also claims that the transmission was so intense it brought him to his knees.

as orbs changed direction to south, he noticed seven green flares being ejected from port side of both craft during transmission. 

at south treeline of 20890 friesland rd, the craft stopped momentarily. subject claims that the name "prometheus" was shouted "in a thousand voices", at which point, the craft vanished vertically upward.

initial reactions of subject were to record the blueprint. subject retreated to personal quarters, and began drawing blueprint and making improvements. subject has no memory of doing so until after the fact. subject believes this was preprogrammed behavior caused by transmission.

total duration of encounter: approx. 10 seconds.
content.summary: Fifth degree close encounter, picture and sound

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:45 pm i decided to go for a walk around the block for half our to an hour, i left my place and enjoyed a peacefull evening stroll. i was walking through a dark alley that cut through two apt building ending up at a old school that is across the road from the high school which has several large football feilds. while in the alley heading home i talked breifly too  a group of guys who claimed to have seen a ufo in the sky and if i hurried over to the field i could still catch them, he pointed me in the direction that they seen the ufo and said they have to leave. i hurried over too the feild and did not notice anything and thought for sure i had missed them, shortly after about a minute of observing the sky i observed some lights that seemed to come from nowhere, i saw five bright circular lights in the sky that were in a boomerange like v formation, the ufo was in the very bottom part of the cloud layer and the clouds around the ufo's lights vanished all around for hundreds of feet. i felt a feeling of fear and astonishment when i first seen the craft, the lights were in the east direction moving south climbing in altitude, i observed the lights as they began to get smaller, the light started to pulsate and grow brighter when the ufo dissapeared in a streak of light much like what a shooting star looked like only the streak of light traveled into space instead of the ground. i was still watching the sky and observed a light travel back from the direction in which it had shot away, the light was moving at super speeds because it traveled towards myself growing a bit brighter, the lights then slowed down and stayed stationary. the sighting lasted for about ten minutes and occured just after 9 pm. i could still make out the ufo when i left the school field.

i walked home very excited about what i had just observed and the first thing i was going to say to my roomate was if he wanted too come and take a look at a ufo in the sky near the highschool, so i came upstairs gave his door a quick knock and enteed his room. i was instantly hit by a big gust of wind that mad the curtains hit the roof and i almost blacked out, it felt like i had been drugged or was overcome by s deamonic dark presence, i remember seeing a dark shadow creature come over me freezing me with fear. i thought immidiatly to myself oh my god i just had my roomate abducted and i went to the living room where i noticed that 20 minutes had elapsed in 40 seconds, i looked around the house for my roomate and finally found him outside when i told him the things that had just happened, he didnt think it was crazy at all. i was overcome by an energy and dreading feeling that i had too get out of the house, i thought for sure i was going to be abducted and i did not want to put anyones life in danger.

 i left the house and walked for about an hour too a picnic table at a small creek that was still in the city but it was late and i barely observed a vehicle. at this time i was starting to calm down and was beginning to accept what had recently happened to me, i was a little bit on edge because i jumped when something came out of the bushes, it turned out to be a dog that stopped to take a drink out of the creek and  ontinued on his way.

it was starting to get late, approximately 1 am, i grabbed my backpack and was about to head to the road when i heard something i  the bushes again and thought it was the dog havi g another drink at the creek so i walked down to the waters edge to see if i  could pet him and make a friend, i was mistaken because i observed two short human like creatures, around 4' tall and a slender build, they had dark eyes that were larger then our own and no visible hair clothes to speak off. the creatures were dark in colour but not black, possibly a dark grey. i watched the et's run away from me running towards a carwash looking back at me for a glance, the one et jumped o top of a car with ease and ran over the top of it jumping down and continuing to follow the other et as they ran into the dark where i could not make them out. i i stantly thought" if they are running that way i am going this way" and i made my way to the brightly light highway that was nearby. i was honestly scared of these things and all i wanted to do at this time was too feel safe. i honestly dont know what they were going to do to me or why they ran away, it has even crossed my mind that perhaps they were either comming to drink water from the creek or were stalking the stray dog that recently came from the path that the et's were. i accept now that we are not alone and am amazed at the fact that we have so many docu ented account of the same lights in the sky and the same creatures known as the grey aliens.
content.summary: Observed five circular lights above me in a v like boomerange formation. 20 min missing time and alien visit

content.detailedDescription: I thought i captured an airplane while shooting the super moon, after i enlarged it i found something else.  there is also a blue circle below the moon.
content.summary: I examined my photos and i thought i captured a

content.detailedDescription: I live in the country between windsor' mo. and whiteman afb at 7am i wed grabnt outside to open the chicken barn to let chickens out on my way back inside i saw 2 white orbs softball in size one was sitting on the power line the other one was hovering above the power line about 3 ft above the power line i observed them for about a minute as i was heading back inside i tried to act like i wasn't seeing them so i could get my camera and sneak back out to get a picture they evidently read my mind and were gone when i got back outside
content.summary: 2 white orbs 1 on power line one hovering above power line

content.detailedDescription:
We pretty much have our game-cam out daily. this is a few of the pictures we have gotten over the past 2 years. we do have more photos of more unexplainable events. don't know if these are anything to investigate, but would like to know what the "heck" is going on.  
please contact if interested.

thanks,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Recorded on game cam

content.detailedDescription:
At time active duty navy chief with 4000 hours flying in p3c  aircraft.  i was in usaf first
was jet engine mech then f4c crew chief.  have flown all over the world and all types of 
flying craft.  we were visiting our parents in pa.  at lake wallenpaupack above the lake is where my moms house is.  my daughter and i left her house to go down to town when i noticed the ufo hovering by the dam.  i sped up and pulled in to the observation area by the dam and we got out.  there were no cell phone cameras at the time. i did not have my camera with me.  we observed this craft hover above the water. no sound. no smells of any kind.  just many color lights.  then it took off like a shot out of a gun, gone.  we just stood and looked at easy other.  i asked did you see what i saw.  she said yes.   she was a freshman in highschool. i later found out it was possibly  from. a flap around the hudson river area of more than 150 sihgtings.  now the hudson river is about 100 miles east of the lake. i saw on mufon hanger one story about the flap.  now this is interesting because when we fly on a ussr sub or even two we call it a flap!!!  anyway it was in 1987 summer time and i never knew where to report a sighting.  now in 1986 my crew took off out of bermuda at 3 am during my after take off inspection of the plane a large white orb flew all around our plane and parked just in front of our p3 and kept a perfect 599 foot space there while we were climbing out of the island.  well we were frequed out.  i had to slap both pilots and screen push the nose over or we will stall.  i had to  push the yok forward and hold level flight while they cane out of the trance the we're in.  tower called and asked if we wanted to report.  we said no.  we came back and all went to the chiefs club and got drunk........
content.summary: Visiting mother at lake. my daughter and i saw object hovering by the dam. no sound,smells about 100 ft above lake.  took off like a shot. watched for 7 mins.

content.detailedDescription: El pasado jueves 7 de agosto de 2014 en la localidad de la bañeza - león - españa, en torno a las 22:30 y 23:00 he sido espectador de un acontecimiento un tanto peculiar en mi vida, pues mientras me dirigía a dar un paseo y a fumar después de haber cenado me dirigía por un camino y al pasar el ultimo edificio percibí una luz en el cielo semejante a una estrella, en un primer momento pensé estar viendo la estación espacial internacional, pues no es la primera vez que me pega un susto. esta vez fue diferente, se desplazaba a gran velocidad y otras dos luces un poco por delante de esta (estas dos también eran semejantes a una estrella pero con una intensidad lumínica menor) se adentraron en una nube donde las perdí de vista por un segundo , cuando de repente una luz blanco-anaranjada salió del interior de esta. la primera luz de tambaleó un poco mientras aumentó su velocidad cruzando desde la parte  éste hasta noroeste pasando por delante de un avión comercial proveniente de león después  desapareciendo detrás de una nube. al poco momento una estrella fugaz apareció un poco mas al oeste de la posición del avión.Poco después la luz reapareció pero en sentido contrario pasando por delante del avion y perdiéndose en una nube de contaminación lumínica de un pueblo cercano. esta visión me produjo una sensación similar a la que me produce el asmr pero mucho mas intensa, con la piel de gallina, no quería quitar la vista de estas luces dado que era mi primera experiencia real en primera persona. al darme cuenta de que ya no vería mas me dirigí a mi casa a redactar al detalle lo que vi. pero yo creo que no lo olvidaré nunca.
content.summary: La primera era una estrella de gran intensidad luminica las otras mas suaves

content.detailedDescription:
on august 23rd, 2014 i (thomas lee curtin jr. ohio mufon f.I.) was invited to a picnic outing at [name removed/cms/tg] residence near pymatuning lake.(this area is rural area next to pymatuning lake, farmlands and thick forest). upon arriving while conversing with mr. "b", knowing i was with mufon he stated to me that on several occasions he had seen orbs of red light about the brightness of the moon traveling at elevation about 1/2 over the horizon from the northwest to the southwest sometimes in numbers from two (2) to seven (7) at a time. he stated that the objects moved in a floating to fast moving manner in which they seemed to be controlled, "not in a way shooting stars move" and made no sound. he also stated that objects were approximately a mile away and about approximately three thousand feet in the air. he stated that from where he was viewing them they were about the size of a basketball and upon looking at them through his telescope that they seemed to have the "divited-like" surface pattern of a golf ball. he stated when the objects would reach a certain point that they would simply blink out and disappear. mr "b" stated that his wife mrs. {name removed/cms/tg], his step daughter "m" and her husband "j" had all seen the objects as well on occasion while visiting and that when the objects would appear it was always between 9:00pm and 12:00am.
     each witness was interviewed separately by this investigator and all the witnesses mentioned above were consistent in their testimonies. the weather conditions of "b"'s sightings were always warm and clear nights and the objects always traveled in a diagonal pattern from the northwest sky to the southwest sky. mr. [name removed/cms/tg] is a a laborer at by profession, has a high school education, wears glasses and was wearing them at the time of his sightings. he considers himself to have good vision (with glasses on), is not colorblind, has good hearing and was not under the influence of drugs or alcohol when he sighted the objects nor were the other witnesses. mr. [name removed/cms/tg] was the main witness who reported the incident [names removed/cms/tg]  wish to remain anonymous.
     the nearest airports to the area are the youngstown airport, 1453 kingsville road, vienna, ohio, 44473 and the youngstown airforce reserve base, 3976 king graves road, #10, vienna, ohio, 44473. the airport is 24.81 miles southwest of the area of sighting and the airbase is 30.62 miles southwest of the sighting area. the last sighting reported above was approximately on the date of 07/26/14 in which four of the objects were observed by the witnesses.
content.summary: Four red glowing red orbs moving fast over horizon from nw to sw before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
During october, 2013, while viewing some recent downloaded frames from a wireless security camera, situated in my back yard, i happened to notice that one of the pictures contained an anomaly which i have no explanation for. the camera is located approximately 12 feet high and overlooks the back portion of my house. it is set to snap photos of anything that triggers its motion detector function. the snapshot that i observed was of an object in the northwest sky just beyond my house. 
the object appears to be spherical with a ring around the middle. i have zoomed in on the photo as my software will allow and the shape becomes distorted but with a noticeable aura (possibly a heat signature?). 
i am at a loss to explain this phenomenon further and have been reluctant to post this information due to the fact that i have no way of knowing if it is a real ufo or some other explanation.   i leave that to the viewer and the experts.
content.summary: Unknown object photographed by surveillance cam

content.detailedDescription: My cousin (former navy guy) and i watched 9 large orange red objects fly from south to north over marlton new jersey around 9:20-9:30pm. i captured 2 on video which i have attached. they made no sound and sky was clear. we saw 2 at first following eachother, then a third, then number 4 & 5. then a lull in the action for a minute, then number 6, then a lull for a minute, then number 7, then a lull for a minute, then number 8 and 9. none were side by side, all followed behind eachother. my cousin estimated the speed at between 600-700mph. i only have a youtube version of video. i can send link if you want.
content.summary: Observed 9 red/orange large objects over 10 min period flying south to north

content.detailedDescription: Was outside august 18th , 2013 , approximately 11:30 pm... my wife and i saw what appeared to be a triangular shaped craft moving directly overhead from east to west... we tried to listen for any sounds but could not hear any... after it passed directly overhead (still heading west) i took some photos...
content.summary: Witnessed a triangular shape craft heading from east to west , passed directly overhead...

content.detailedDescription: In october/november of 2006, my wife's father, who is a command master chief in the navy, invited us to okinawa japan. the ufo sighting i am referring to occurred on november 7th, 2006 above chicago's o'hare airport. our plane was united airlines flight 0878 and i was seated in row 37(i still have my boarding pass). the sighting happened at roughly 4:00 pm. our plane was descending to land and i was waiting to see the airport as we were passing through the clouds. when we cleared the cloud level, i immediately saw the airport and gradually noticed a grey, round object. this object was motionless. i know this because our altitude's "crossed". meaning there was a definite moment when we were above it, a moment when we were level, and a moment when we were below it. it was during this transition in altitudes that i have my most vivid memory of it's description. it was elliptical in shape, dull grey, with no visible markings. there were no openings for windows or doors. as we landed i lost sight of it but saw it again as our plane was turning on the tarmac. i cannot say if it was still in the same location but as we were moving it stayed in the same position. it's size at that moment was about the size of a half dollar held at arm's length. i remember the flight attendant handing me a customs pamphlet to fill out. i looked at her and looked back at the object. it was still there. within seconds of me looking back at it, it rapidly "shot" up. the only way i can describe this movement is if you were to hold an object at eye level, release it and watch it fall to the ground. in other words, imagine the cloud level as the ground and the object "falling" towards it. i remember ducking to see where it might have gone. i remember seeing a "hole" in the cloud level. i also remember seeing light reflected off the interior of the hole so the hole must have went straight through the cloud level. i did not mention this to anyone accept my wife who did not see any of this happening. it was only later, in january of 2007, that i saw a news story of this object that i had saw. in this story they mentioned that the workers on the tarmac and some pilots had seen this object so i knew i had not hallucinated this event. i remember being shaky after we left the plane and went through customs. that's all that happened. i have never seen a ufo before and never since. i don't know what it was but i know what it wasn't. it wasn't a drone or military craft. why would the military be flying a secret craft above one of the busiest airports in the country? it wasn't a weather event. i've been thinking about this for the last 7+ years and have come to realize that for it to go from completely motionless to fast enough to punch a hole through the clouds, it would have created a sonic boom probably powerful enough to shatter every window in the airport. how it did not do this is probably a bigger mystery than the object itself.
content.summary: Observed a disk shaped object hovering at chicago o'hare airport. witnessed as my plane was landing and as plane was on the tarmac.

content.detailedDescription:
{1}i was on my rooftop at night, preparing to sleep, and gazing at stars.
{2}the object was glowing very differently, changing colour. changing direction, changing altitude.
{3}it was on the west direction from my location.
{4}the object was like a glowing orb, which was yellow/gold/orange and silver/white color, it was changing it's color, it was dimming and glowing, it look big, because it was releasing a lot of light, it appeared in west direction, hover at many place while travelling from west to south west direction. change it color, altitude, hover, increase it's intensity of light.No sounds.
{5}i was amazed, i was totally a different experience, i even called my friend at between 11 pm to 11:30 pm and told him about this, firstly he also was amazed that i was seeing it from my rooftop, he also replied he don;t have any answer for this.
{6}in 30 august 2014 it just vanished, when i was looking to it. but in 31 august 2014 i saw it moving from west direction to south west direction and descent on south west direction from my location.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have seen ufo 2 times, on 30 and as well as on 31 august 2014 after 11 pm on west direction, it was like glowing orb like object. which was changing direction, changing altitude, changing color, making no sound, and was hovering at many places.

content.detailedDescription: Upon whitnessing this event i ran home aprox quater mile. immediately drawing for family. no sign of object was left. the following day ,sunday, the object was reported in the national papers. it took too long to run home that night, the object should still have been vissable as i monitored it all the way home. but in the seconds it took to call family it had gone. also i have a memory of a device. a circular magnetic device , i could draw from memory. that night it took too long to run home, i can't remember how i got from the rugby field to my street,and the speed in which the object mooved  it should still have been vissable. various people throuout the village also saw the object independently .
content.summary: Huge triangle mooved over village,no sound three domed lights solid ,real.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside and seen this bright red dot very close to me in a tree it pulsed like trying to communicate possibly morse code? or someone aiming a truglo type scope at me and turning the knob or dial this happened after the huge silent transparent or black triangle ufo w/3 bright white lights on each corner hovered sideways then leveled tree top over me and left like a leaf in the breeze. i dont know who owns it but it is really something that is possibly and probably not from here but maybe a tr3 or huge drone? i only have questions no answers.
content.summary: I do not understand what the red orbs are but it pulses like morse code

content.detailedDescription: On sept 1 at 0455 i was walking north on hwy 441 in the city of okeechobee, fl and looking northwest into a clear cloudless night sky, i saw a fast moving lighted craft that seemed too bright and moving too fast to be an airplane. the craft appeared to be about at about 1000 ft altitude and moving from west to east. the color of the lights were a very bright white light with two or three dimmer lights of red and blue much like an airplanes navigational lights appear.  i watched it for about 6 seconds, then saw a bright flash of orange light where the other lights had been and then all the lights disappeared.  i looked into the sky where the craft should have been before the flash and there were no lights, shadows, or smoke in that area of the sky.  this event happened about one quarter of a mile from me, the craft disappeared about   1000 ft above the okeechobee county library.
content.summary: Fast moving low flying craft disappears in a bright orange flash

content.detailedDescription:
I was studying engineering at uc irving 1982 , family members came to visit me and my sister ,who also was living in irving with her husband etham that also was studying engineering at uc irving, our visitors wanted to go to las vegas for the weekend. after we arrived in las vegas at the grand palace hotel and checked in.It was around 5 pm . i wanted to look around at the shops in the hotel , i remember going down a floor or two from the lobby where many shops are located. among them was a barbour shop. i enter to cut my hear. the lady that attended me was then in here early 40's.She asked me to go where they wash people hair and she started washing my hear. suddenly, i felt that her hand was moving very very fast, almost like a machine in a circle motion above my head.I felt heat above my head and a cone shape energy above my head. i had my ayes closed.  then creators appeared in my head . they looked like humans but quiet deferential in body size and head type. their body was small , abut two feet, with a round big head with very big ayes.I felt that they were investigating my brain. all of the sudden , i realized of their presences in my head and one of them , the female ,told the other  been that i found out about their presence in my head after that they despaired from my head . then i felt that the heat dissipated   and the lady that was washing my head hand stopped moving. i also remember that when the lady started to cut my hear , she accidentally got a small cut with the sizer on her finger.

after that i was in state of shock , thinking of what had happened to me. to distract my self , it was about 6 pm , i went to play black jack , i remember playing and only winning for almost one hour then i stopped playing and went for a nap. 

from that time i developed a great interest in space and knowing more about ufo's.

now i live in jordan , i am a mechanical engineer and currently business man in the solar energy sector.

i wash science discovery on tv and that where i found out about your organization and decided to file this report.

may aliens are already living among us but we haven't discovered them because they are much smarter that us in that sense that they can change their appearance that make it practically impossible for us humans to detect their presence. could this theory be possible?


thank you for your kind attention.
content.summary: Human like but smaller , less that 30 cm ,  big cone shape head with very big eyes.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my house with north facing windows.  i was watching tv. two pulsing lights came into view traveling north. the lights were bright white and were regularly pulsing. this caught my eye since it was dark. i thought it was a plane, but noticed right away that there no red or green lights like a plane has. i pointed it out to my husband who went out to our porch. he said that there was no sound and he saw the same object. the object continued north until out of view. as it proceeded north, it appeared to hover at a couple of points. we lost sight of it after out view was blocked by trees. my husband felt it was a ufo because we couldn't identify what it was and it was silent.
content.summary: We saw pulsing white lights.

content.detailedDescription: 3 orange orbs sighted around 9:45pm going in a straight line, one after another traveling nw, my friend and i stared at it for a few minutes in disbelief.  no e
content.summary: 3 orange orbs sighted around 9:45pm going in a straight line, one after another traveling nw, my friend and i stared at it for a few minutes in disbelief.  no explanation. we tried to rule every explanation out, but we are left perplexed.
